data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 12955, Version Hash: 620d7c22aaa4dd19f283e66b35c9492ea027a171
data.actual_result: You see the cross mark on the role tag
data.expected_result: You should not see the remove "X", like you can't remove roles
data.short_description: Remove button is seen on roles created by applications
data.steps_to_repro: - Go on a server you have manage permissions - Click on any bot with a role created by itself on join - In the mini profile, hover on the application role and you should see the button to remove the role from the user
